Integrator_Int

This component performs a cumulative sum of the integer values presented to the data input [In]val.

When the input event is triggered, the current value presented to the data input [In]val is added to the cumulative sum. An offset value is then added to the cumulative sum and the result presented to the data output and the event output is triggered. The offset value for the cumulative sum is specified by the parameter Offset or if the the data input [In]offset is connected, by the value presented to this port.

When the input event [In]reset is triggered, the cumulative sum is set to zero. Following a [In]reset event, the offset value is presented to the data output and the event output is triggered.

Ports

  • [In] offset:

    Data input, the value of the offset for the cumulative sum.

  • [In] val:

    Data input, the value to be added to the cumulative sum.

  • [Out] :

    Data output, the result of adding the cumulative sum and the offset.

  • [In] :

    Event input, triggers the addition of [In]val to the cumulative sum.

  • [Out] :

    Event output, triggered when value of the cumulative sum has been updated.

  • [In] reset:

    Event input, triggers the setting of the cumulative sum to 0.

Parameters

  • Offset:

    Offset to be added to cumulative sum.

    Data Type:

    I,

    Min Value:

    -2147483648,

    Max Value:

    2147483647,

    Default Value:

    0

State Machine

Stateless.

Profiles

All.

Toolbox

Core.

Version

v2.1.

Native Dependencies

  • TDK1.1:

Licence Type

LGPL.

Component Supplier

inx ltd.
